page.content: The cost of buying new implements. {Tractors:}Ford 5610 72 din hp 2 wheel drive Â£13,000.4 wheel drive_ Â£16,670.Ford 6610 82 din hp (most popular selling tractor)2 wheel drive Â£14,807.4 wheel drive Â£18,487.
